short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See if a site is connected to Addrevenue affiliate network. Apply. Create tracking links. See campaigns. All from one extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension requires an affiliate account at Addrevenue.

With this extension, as an affiliate you can see if a site is connected to Addrevenue affiliate network. You can apply to new addvertisers. Create tracking links. See all active campaigns. All from one easy-to-use Chrome extension.
